any.description: Can be anything (text, int, bool, json, html, etc.)
any.example: This is a content of any type !

configured.description: Indicates if the account is configured

hiddenFromGAL.description: Hide account in Global Address List

mailingFilter.description: Enable or disable anti-virus and anti-spam

passwordLastUpdate.description: Time of account's password last update

canReceiveEmail.description: Determines if ingoing message has been received

canSendEmail.description: Determines if outgoing message has been delivered

connectiveWebmail.description: Determines if possible to authenticate with credentials

isMxValid.description: Determines if MX record for account's domain is properly set

isSpammer.description: Determines if account is flagged as spammer

isSrvValid.description: Determines if SRV (autodiscovery) record for account's domain is properly set

email.mxplan.AccountFullAccess.description: Users having full access on this mailbox

allowedAccountId.description: Account id to give full access

email.mxplan.AccountSendAs.description: Users authorized to send mails from this mailbox

allowedAccountId.description: Account id to give send as

email.mxplan.AccountSendOnBehalfTo.description: Get users authorized to Send On Behalf To mails from this mailbox

allowedAccountId.description: Account id to give send on behalf to

cnameToCheck.description: Cname that will be checked to prove the domain ownership

domainAliases.description: List of aliases for this domain

expectedMX.description: Expected MX record(s) on this domain

isAliasDomain.description: Indicate if this domain is an alias for another domain

mxIsValid.description: If true your dns mx configuration is valid

mxRecord.description: Domain MX record configured in DNS

mxRelay.description: If specified, emails to not existing address will be redirected to that domain

srvIsValid.description: If true your dns srv record is valid

srvRecord.description: Domain SRV record configured in DNS

email.mxplan.ExternalContact.description: External contact for this mxplan service

hiddenFromGAL.description: Hide the contact in Global Address List

isAValid.description: If true your dns A record is valid

isAaaaValid.description: If true your dns AAAA record is valid

isPtrV6Valid.description: If true your dns ptrV6 record is valid

isPtrValid.description: If true your dns ptr record is valid

complexityEnabled.description: enable policy for strong and secure passwords

lockoutDuration.description: number of minutes account will remain locked if it occurs

lockoutObservationWindow.description: number of minutes that must elapse after a failed logon to reset lockout trigger

lockoutThreshold.description: number of attempts before account to be locked

maxPasswordAge.description: maximum number of days that account's password is valid before expiration

maxReceiveSize.description: Maximum message size that You can receive in MB

maxSendSize.description: Maximum message size that You can send in MB

minPasswordAge.description: minimum number of days before able to change account's password

minPasswordLength.description: minimum number of characters password must contain

quotas.description: List of allowed quotas (no constraint if null)

content.description: Signature, added at the bottom of your organization emails

outsideOnly.description: Activate the disclaimer only for external emails

deleteSpam.description: If message is a spam delete it

deleteVirus.description: If message is a virus delete it

putInJunk.description: If message is a spam or virus put in junk. Overridden by deleteSpam or deleteVirus

tagSpam.description: If message is a spam change its subject

tagVirus.description: If message is a virus change its subject

iam.ResourceMetadata.description: IAM resource metadata embedded in services models

tags.description: Resource tags. Tags that were internally computed are prefixed with ovh:

urn.description: Unique resource name used in policies

operator.description: Operator to use in order to filter on the value (defaults to 'EQ')

value.description: Value to use in order to filter tags

iam.resource.TagFilter.OperatorEnum.description: Operator that can be used in order to filter resources tags

scopes.services/all: Manage your services lifecycle and billing
